page.title: 03FARMING,MUTHILL,OTHER CROPS.
page.content: { {HAY}is dried grass which is baled and stored. {Silage}is grass which is cut and stored when it is green. Both are fed to animals. In our area there are seven fields of {Turnips} and twenty fields of {Potatoes.}Some of the potatoes go to shops, but many are used for {Seed, }an important product in our area. One farmer grows {Peas}. They are cut by a pea viner,( or by combine) and are processed as high protein animal feed. There are twelve areas of woodland, some of which are all {Coniferous}, others are mixed {Deciduous.} In general, the soil is fertile, apart from some of the upland areas, which are used for grazing sheep. The most important crops are {Barley} and {Seed {Potatoes.
